article: president chen shui-bian should take the blame for the strong suspicion provoked in taiwan by the news that he has promised to extend us$ #.# million in a syndicated loan to the dominican republic , a ranking kuomintang official said on friday .
abstract: kmt official criticizes president 's loan rhetoric
